HOURLYNERD!

Boston, Software Engineer

HourlyNerd is a marketplace that connects businesses to top freelancers for short-term consulting projects. We've raised seed funding (from Mark Cuban and another major investor) and are growing extremely quickly. We're helping SMBs grow in a way they previously couldn't, while also disrupting the Bain/McKinsey/BCG model at Fortune 500s.

Looking for a couple of developers to join a fun, passionate, and growing team. Email me at pat@hourlynerd.com!!
